net.cnri.repository.android

Class EmbeddedRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.cnri.repository.AbstractRepository
      • net.cnri.repository.android.EmbeddedRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SupportsSearchExcluding, Repository
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientRepository

    public class EmbeddedRepository
extends AbstractRepository
implements Repository, SupportsSearchExcluding
    Implements the Repository interface by writing data to an Android ContentProvider backed by an SQLite database. Allows you to create a Repository on an Android device.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EmbeddedRepository(android.content.Context context, java.lang.String authority)
      Creates an EmbeddedRepository pointing to a specific content provider specified by its authority.

      • createDigitalObject

        public DigitalObject createDigitalObject(java.lang.String handle)
                                  throws CreationException,
                                         RepositoryException
        Description copied from interface: Repository
        Creates a new digital object with the given identifier in this repository. Passing null requests that the repository assign a new unique identifier; this method will throw UnsupportedOperationException if the given repository does not support that functionality.
        Specified by:
        createDigitalObject in interface Repository
        Parameters:
        handle - the identifier for the new digital object, or null to request that the repository assign a new unique identifier.
        Returns:
        the newly-created digital object
        Throws:
        CreationException - if an object with the given identifier already exists within the repository
        RepositoryException
